mapper.select: SELECT SUM(fh.user_funding_amount) AS sumfundingamount, SUM(fh.user_funding_pct) AS sumfundingpct FROM funding_history fh LEFT OUTER JOIN farm_and_product fp ON (fh.product_serial_num = fp.product_serial_num) WHERE fh.product_serial_num = #{product_serial_num}

SELECT fp.product_serial_num, fp.product_name, fp.product_kind, fm.farmer_name, fp.farm_introduction, fp.farm_name, fp.farm_address, fp.farmer_phone, fp.farm_square_footage, fp.expected_planting_date, fp.expected_harvest_date, fp.funding_thumb_img_url, fp.funding_product_img_url, fri.target_total_amount FROM farm_and_product fp LEFT OUTER JOIN funding_reg_info fri ON (fp.product_serial_num = fri.product_serial_num) LEFT OUTER JOIN farmers fm ON (fp.farmer_serial_num = fm.farmer_serial_num) where fp.product_serial_num = #{product_serial_num}
select count(*) from user_cart where product_serial_num=#{product_serial_num}
select user_point from users where user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM funding_history WHERE user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} AND product_serial_num = #{product_serial_num}
